providers.name: Sectigo
providers.headline: Safety on the Web with Sectigo Certificates
providers.tagline: Offer Sectigo SSL products to your clients to increase their end user’s confidence and transaction rates. Sectigo digital certificates stand out due to favorable prices, reliable SSL protection, and 99.3% browser compatibility.
providers.more: Certificates of all validation types (Extended, Organization and Domain Validation) are available. Moreover, you can decide to offer wildcard certificates for an unlimited number of sub-domains and certificates with SAN support (Subject Alternative Name). SAN certificates enable a single certificate to secure multiple domain names (multi-domain certificates).

providers.name: GeoTrust
providers.headline: Secure Web Sites Through GeoTrust Certificates
providers.tagline: GeoTrust is a brand of the well-known Certificate Authority DigiCert. GeoTrust SSL products provide security on the Internet from the basic domain validation to the most advanced authentication supported by the Extended Validation SSL standard.
providers.more: The GeoTrust Site Seal gives your customers and business partners the confidence necessary to do online business with a website. The seal includes a time and date stamp verifying the current validity of the SSL certificate. Benefit from a 99+% browser compatibility and choose from the available wildcard and SAN (Subject Alternative Name) options.
features: GeoTrust Dynamic Site Seal with a real-time date and time stamp

providers.name: RapidSSL
providers.headline: Secure Encryption with Low-cost RapidSSL Certificates
providers.tagline: RapidSSL offers simple SSL certificates which are well-suited as a starter SSL product.
providers.more: RapidSSL products provide a validation of the domain name. The security of transactions on a customer's website is confirmed via the RapidSSL Site Seal. A wildcard option for securing unlimited sub-domains is also available. Furthermore, RapidSSL certificates have over 99% browser recognition.

providers.name: DigiCert
providers.headline: Strong SSL Encryption with DigiCert Certificates
providers.tagline: DigiCert is well-known for offering products used to secure e-commerce and communications over intranets, extranets, and the web. 80% of the Forbes Global 2000 and 97% of the world’s largest banks are secured by EV and OV certificates issued by DigiCert.
providers.more: They trust DigiCert because of its encryption technology and rigorous business authentication practices. Improve your conversion rates with the DigiCert Secured Seal from one of the world's most-trusted Certificate Authority. Plus, any DigiCert certificate can be configured as a multi-domain certificate by adding SANs (Subject Alternative Name) as needed.

providers.name: thawte
providers.headline: Reliable Digital SSL Certificates from Thawte
providers.tagline: SSL certificates from Thawte are issued by the Certificate Authority DigiCert. They provide robust authentication and encryption, assuring your customers' data and transactions are secure. All Thawte products include the Thawte Trusted Site Seal, a globally recognized trust mark.
providers.more: In addition to certificates with basic and medium validation, Thawte also offers the Extended Validation standard for high-level verification. Wildcard certificates for securing unlimited sub-domains within a single certificate are also available, as well as an optional SAN  (Subject Alternative Name) support.
features: Thawte Trusted Site Seal, available in 18 languages

certificates.name: True Business ID EV SAN Package
